entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
